verses.text: \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* hath \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*: \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w enlarged|strong="H7337"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* joyed \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.

\w There|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w other|strong="H0369"\w* beside thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* strong \w like|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

The \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* \w of|strong="H1368"\w* the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w is|strong="H7198"\w* overcome, \w and|strong="H7198"\w* the \w weak|strong="H3782"\w* \w are|strong="H1368"\w* girt \w with|strong="H2428"\w* \w strength|strong="H2428"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* killeth \w and|strong="H3068"\w* maketh \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* bringeth \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* hell \w and|strong="H3068"\w* bringeth \w back|strong="H5927"\w* again.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* maketh \w poor|strong="H3423"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* maketh \w rich|strong="H6238"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* humbleth \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* exalteth.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Elcana \w went|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Ramatha, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w ministered|strong="H8334"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Heli \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.
